column2: Proportion of households that suffered from food insecurity
Percentage of households reporting that they suffered from moderate to severe or severe food insecurity

The number of respondents who select/tick "yes" to at least 4 of the FIES questions(Q18151 to Q18157 inclusive) divided by the number of respondents who select/tick "yes" or "no" to the eight FIES questions
No calculations were performed in the data acquisition of this indicator as appropriate data was readily available in the final format specified by this indicator.
Percentage households that experienced food insecurity in bristol
